name: Stellar School Mobile App UI Kit
description:
1.1k Views on Behance


Stellar School Management Mobile App - Student Module UI Kit is a part of a solution to manage Super Admins, Teachers, Students, Finance Staff, and Bus Staff. These different mobile apps will give fruitful user experience to their stakeholders. This UI Kit contains ready to use components, Typography, Design System, and customizable Color Palette. With 25+ Unique Layouts, we covered almost every aspect of a Student App would require. This UI Kit is available for both Adobe XD and Figma.
